name: The Vanella Group, Inc.
overview:
The Vanella Group, Inc. identifies large sales opportunities for enterprise technology companies.

The Vanella Group, Inc. is an enhanced capability B2B teleservices firm working exclusively with enterprise technology providers. Our programs perform 5x above industry standards for teleservices using our advanced methodology. With deep expertise in steering through today’s selling landscape, we build real relationships with prospects, get real-time sales intelligence and make sure your reps are in the right place at the right time.

Now about to celebrate our 13th year, we have maintained our position as a top-tier provider of teleservices through the revenue impact we have made for some of the most well-known technology companies in the world. Our services include buy cycle identification, executive engagement, real-time sales intelligence, account profiling, executive level outreach, pre-sales support, and other high performance programs. Our ecosystem of partnerships includes Salesforce, Marketo, InsideView, the SLMA, Alinean, InsideSales.com, Alinean,and Genius.

The Aberdeen Group has mentioned us in 3 of their last reports/studies on “Outsourced B2B Teleservices” to represent the Market Intelligence-to-Opportunity Category.

Specialties Engagement with Leads, TeleServices, Lead Management, Lead Generation, Cold Calling/Telemarketing, Marketo, Marketing, Marketing Automation, Salesforce, Sales Development, Business Development, Active Opportunity Discovery, Sales Intelligence, Appointment Setting

Headquarters Camden Ave San Jose, 95124 United States

Website http://www.VanellaGroup.com Industry Marketing and Advertising

Type Privately Held

Company Size 11-50 employees

Founded 2001
